status.notFound: The requested resource was not found

loadError.topic: There was an error loading the discussion.

suggestions.title: Is a key statement missing from the query?
suggestions.label: Suggest your own statement to the query

status.isEmpty: You cannot submit an empty statement
status.isDuplicate: The same statement has already been added to the discussion

modal.title: What is a good statement?
modal.li2: Brings out new perspectives or experiences
modal.desc: Remember that the statements are displayed randomly and you do not respond directly to the statements of other participants.

thanks.title: Thank you for participating!
thanks.desc: These were all the statements for this time. However, the discussion continues, so please come back later to respond to new statements!

footer.title: Polis
footer.desc: DigiFinland and Sitra have brought to Finland the open source Polis online platform. The purpose of Polis is to enable large groups to participate in a constructive exchange of views around a chosen topic.
footer.disclaimer: The Polis online platform is in beta and does not yet meet all the requirements for accessibility and usability.
